channel.title: CVE Feed for General Electric -- Proficy CIMPLICITY
channel.description: The latest CVEs for General Electric -- Proficy CIMPLICITY

item.title: CVE-2022-23921|2024-08-03T03:59:23.018Z -- general%20electric -- proficy%20cimplicity
item.description: Exploitation of this vulnerability may result in local privilege escalation and code execution. GE maintains exploitation of this vulnerability is only possible if the attacker has login access to a machine actively running CIMPLICITY, the CIMPLICITY server is not already running a project, and the server is licensed for multiple projects.

item.title: CVE-2022-21798|2024-08-03T02:53:36.261Z -- general%20electric -- proficy%20cimplicity
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable due to cleartext transmission of credentials seen in the CIMPLICITY network, which can be easily spoofed and used to log in to make operational changes to the system.
